Key Match Events: Sunil Chhetri scored a penalty goal in the 38' minute
Rahmat Akbari scored a goal in the 70' minute
Sharif Mukhammad scored a penalty goal in the 88' minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Indira Gandhi Stadium in Guwahati, India
Others: India lost to Afghanistan 1-2 in the 2026 World Cup Qualifying - AFC, Second Round
